title: Pull Handle
description: Rope Pull Handle - Pull Start Handle

entries.title: About the Print
entries.text: My previous mower pull start fell through the loop that was holding it and got chopped by the mower. Twice!!! I could have chosen one that was more ergonomic but I wanted something big and beefy enough that it wouldn't happen again. This one fit the bill. You can see from the pic it is not going anywhere.

entries.name: Rope Pull Handle - Pull Start Handle
